alert.note: Alert for Desha; Drew; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 2:41PM CDT until August 16 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Eastern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... South central Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 240 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Winchester, or 11 miles northeast of Monticello, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tillar... McGehee... Reed... Collins... Florence... Selma... Enon... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
